context_menu_download_selected_links_wit.message: Download selected links with AB DM

config_auto_capture_links_description.message: When you click on link on your browser the link will automatically captured for download by the App

config_auto_capture_links_file_extension.message: Enter each file extension that you want to be captured then press enter

config_show_popups_description.message: Show popup on selections which have links

config_forced_try_capture_description.message: When a non-link tag is selected, also try to capture this content as a download link

config_port_description.message: Make sure this port and the value in app are the same otherwise this extension not works properly

config_send_cookies_descrption.message: Note: DON‚ÄùT Check this if you are in a non trustable environment

connection_error_api_error.message: There is a problem with app api, Make sure to update both app and extension to latest version

connection_error_network_error.message: Can't connect to Application, Please make sure the app is installed and running and also the Browser Integration is turned On in the application settings

note_about_app_must_be_installed_first.message: In order to this extension work properly,Make sure AB Download Manager is installed if it doesn't...

support_by_rating.message: If you like this work, Don't forget to support me by your comments/ratings and also share it with your friends
